body_html: The above anaconda link is dead, and I'm getting the exact messages that denru01 is getting, ie "Segmentation Fault" with no other messages. I got that after "locally" installing glibc 2.14 and pointing LD_LIBRARY_PATH to it. Anything else I can try to get this to work on centos 6.8?

body: The above anaconda link is dead, and I'm getting the exact messages that denru01 is getting, ie "Segmentation Fault" with no other messages. I got that after "locally" installing glibc 2.14 and pointing LD_LIBRARY_PATH to it. Anything else I can try to get this to work on centos 6.8?
